definition: to keep close to the edge/near the mark/close to (the true figure)/relevant (used with negative to mean totally irrelevant)
to suffer/to endure/to pull through (hard times)/to delay/to stall/to play for time/to dawdle
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 挨邊|挨边[ai1 bian1]

sentences.english: The carpenter put the edges of the boards in line.
sentences.chinese: 木匠把木板挨邊放整齊。
